ing: 1 (14 ounce) package purchased fully baked pizza crust (such as BoboliÂ®)
des: "This is a great appetizer that tastes great and takes seconds to prepare! Just layer Brie cheese and almonds on a  pre-made pizza crust, and bake!"
ins:
Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Arrange Brie slices on pizza crust; cover with sliced almonds.  Bake until cheese is melted and almonds are toasted, about 10 minutes.  Slice into small wedges to serve.
